(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ first) (NN time) (NN I))
    (VP (VBD came)
      (PP (IN across)
        (NP (DT the) (NN name) (`` ``) (NNP Le) (NNP Chasseur) ('' ''))))
    (, ,)))


det(I-4, The-1)
amod(I-4, first-2)
nn(I-4, time-3)
nsubj(came-5, I-4)
root(ROOT-0, came-5)
prep(came-5, across-6)
det(Chasseur-11, the-7)
nn(Chasseur-11, name-8)
nn(Chasseur-11, Le-10)
pobj(across-6, Chasseur-11)

    (VP (VBD thought)

        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (NP (DT a) (JJ French) (NN restaurant))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Then))
    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB when))
      (S
        (NP (PRP I))
        (VP (VBD found)
          (PRT (RP out))
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (VP (VBD was)
                (VP (VBG serving)
                  (NP (JJ local) (NN cuisine))))
              (, ,))))))))

(ROOT
  (S (RB Then)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD found)
      (NP (PRP myself))
      (S
        (VP (VBG standing)
          (ADVP (RB right)
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (NN front))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN restaurant)))
                (NP (CD one) (NN day)))))
          (S
            (VP (VBG wondering)
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP what))
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB eat))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN oil))
      (VP (VBG dripping)
        (PP (IN onto)
          (NP (DT the) (NN charcoal)))))
    (VP (VBZ produces)
      (NP
        (NP (NN smoke))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (NP
              (NP
                (NP (NNS flavors))
                (NP (DT the) (NN prawn)))
              (CC and)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (JJ slight) (NN charring))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NNS legs))
                    (CC and)
                    (NP (NN shell))))))
            (VP (VBZ gives)
              (NP (PRP it))
              (NP
                (NP (DT that) (JJ crispy) (VBN charred) (NN smell))
                (SBAR
                  (FRAG
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP what))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP we))
                        (ADVP (DT all))
                        (VP (VBP love)
                          (PP (IN about)
                            (NP (NNP BBQ) (NN seafood))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ other) (JJ important) (NN ingredient))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN rice))
        (CC and)
        (ADVP (RB here))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB where))
                (S
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ claypot) (NN rice))
                    (PP (IN at)
                      (NP (NNP Le) (NNP Chasseur))))
                  (VP (VBZ distinguishes)))))))))))

amod(ingredient-4, other-2)
amod(ingredient-4, important-3)

cop(rice-7, is-5)
det(rice-7, the-6)
root(ROOT-0, rice-7)

dep(here-9, is-10)

nsubj(distinguishes-18, rice-14)

  (FRAG

    (SBAR
      (WHADVP (WRB when))
      (S
        (NP (PRP he))
        (VP (VBZ makes)
          (NP (PRP$ his) (NNP Tau) (NNP Suan))
          (ADVP (RB here)))
        (, ,)))))

dep(So-1, makes-4)
poss(Suan-7, his-5)

advmod(makes-4, here-8)

ccomp(satisfy-16, uncovered-24)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Oh))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Oh-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB and)
      (SBAR (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP are)
            (VP (VBG wondering)
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (DT the) (NN name) (NNP Le) (NNP Chasseur)))))
          (, ,))))))


root(ROOT-0, and-1)
mark(wondering-5, if-2)
nsubj(wondering-5, you-3)
aux(wondering-5, are-4)
advcl(and-1, wondering-5)
prep(wondering-5, about-6)
det(Chasseur-10, the-7)
nn(Chasseur-10, name-8)
nn(Chasseur-10, Le-9)
pobj(about-6, Chasseur-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN story))
    (VP (VBZ goes)
      (PP (IN like)
        (NP (DT this))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, goes-3)
prep(goes-3, like-4)
pobj(like-4, this-5)

  (S
    (NP (NNP The))
    (VP (VBZ owner))
    (, ,)))

root(ROOT-0, owner-2)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (VP (VBD ran))
    (NP
      (NP (DT a) (NN restaurant))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN name))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Mauritius))))
          (CC and)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB when))
            (S
              (NP (PRP he))
              (VP (VBN returned)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (NNP Singapore)))
                (, ,)))))))))


root(ROOT-0, ran-1)
det(restaurant-3, a-2)
nsubj(ran-1, restaurant-3)
prep(restaurant-3, of-4)
det(name-7, the-5)
amod(name-7, same-6)
pobj(of-4, name-7)
prep(name-7, in-8)
pobj(in-8, Mauritius-9)
cc(name-7, and-10)
advmod(returned-13, when-11)
nsubj(returned-13, he-12)
conj(name-7, returned-13)
prep(returned-13, to-14)
pobj(to-14, Singapore-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP he))
    (VP (VBD decided)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB use)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN name))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, decided-2)
aux(use-4, to-3)
xcomp(decided-2, use-4)
det(name-7, the-5)
amod(name-7, same-6)
dobj(use-4, name-7)

    (SBAR

        (, ,)))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VB mention)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBD read)
              (PP (IN about)
                (NP (PRP him)))
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP (DT the) (NN blog)))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB be)
                (ADJP
                  (ADVP (RBR more) (IN than))
                  (JJ happy)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB give)
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT a) (VBG running) (NN commentary))
                          (PP (IN on)
                            (NP (DT each) (NN dish))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


advmod(mention-2, just-1)
root(ROOT-0, mention-2)
nsubj(read-4, you-3)
dep(mention-2, read-4)
prep(read-4, about-5)
pobj(about-5, him-6)
prep(read-4, from-7)
det(blog-9, the-8)
pobj(from-7, blog-9)
cc(read-4, and-10)
nsubj(happy-16, he-11)
aux(happy-16, will-12)
cop(happy-16, be-13)
advmod(than-15, more-14)
advmod(happy-16, than-15)
conj(read-4, happy-16)
aux(give-18, to-17)
xcomp(happy-16, give-18)
iobj(give-18, you-19)
det(commentary-22, a-20)
amod(commentary-22, running-21)
dobj(give-18, commentary-22)
prep(commentary-22, on-23)
det(dish-25, each-24)
pobj(on-23, dish-25)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map)))


nn(Map-3, View-1)
nn(Map-3, Larger-2)
root(ROOT-0, Map-3)
